name: Zepelin
description:
You are Zepelin, a rare 4-elemental Wizard who has grown tired of the current, mundane world. You discover a portal leading to a cave after countless years, you jump in and try to reach the end. (Hint: There is no End)

Controls:

Space to Jump

Q to use your special elemental power when active.

Have Fun!

Music Credits to Bensound!
